title: ImportError: libpython3.6m.so.1.0
body_html:
I thought I would try pytorch : torch-0.1.10.post2-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64

On the first example I tried (MNIST), it fails:

Traceback (most recent call last): File "main.py", line 3, in <module> import torch File "/home/peter/python36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 53, in <module> from torch._C import * ImportError: libpython3.6m.so.1.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

.. which is correct, there is no such shared object on my system.

Any ideas?
body_text:

.. which is correct, there is no such shared object on my system.
Any ideas?
body:
I thought I would try pytorch : torch-0.1.10.post2-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64

On the first example I tried (MNIST), it fails:

`Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "main.py", line 3, in <module>
    import torch
  File "/home/peter/python36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 53, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: libpython3.6m.so.1.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory`

 .. which is correct, there is no such shared object on my system.

Any ideas?
